description: This is a market on who will win in the FTX Crypto Cup preliminary match-up between Magnus Carlsen and Fabiano Caruana, scheduled to take place on May 25, 2021 at 2:00 PM ET. The market will resolve to “Carlsen” if Magnus Carlsen wins, or “Caruana” if Fabiano Caruana wins. If the preliminary game is a draw, the market will resolve to 50 cents Carlsen and 50 cents Caruana. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day on or before May 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day after May 31, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to 50 cents Carlsen and 50 cents Caruana. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
